content: chart c1/c2 in the middle of the sole change to larger needles if necessary to maintain gauge repeat chart c1/c2 in total 8/9/10 times in the round work row 1 15 once cut mc and change to smaller needles if you have used larger needles in colorwork knit remaining sole sts so you are at the beginning of the round knit 10 rnds or until foot measures about 4 5/5 5/6 5 cm 1 75/2 25/2 75 inches less than desired finished length toe while shaping the toe you will be moving sts from the sole to the instep note that you are alternating ssk and k2tog round 1 - on the instep k2tog knit to the last 2 sts ssk my way - on the sole knit to the last st move the st to the instep round 2 - on the instep ssk my way knit to the last st move 1 st from the sole to the instep k2tog - on the sole knit all sts repeat rnds 1 and 2 until you have 24 sts in total cut yarn leaving a 30 cm tail use the kitchener stitch to graft remaining stitches together enjoy your socks you deserve it copyright 2020 anna mäkilä all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only 4 chart a1 chart a2 chart c1 chart c2 5 chart b 6
